articles.title: 'Ray Clemence played a momentous role in the rise of LFC' - Liverpool FC
articles.description: Former Liverpool captain Phil Thompson has paid a glowing tribute to Ray Clemence and explained why both he and the football club will forever be grateful to the legendary goalkeeper.
